attributes.action: Increase salaries of Nurses and other NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: It is pitiful that our Nurses are being paid low wages for what they are contributing to the society. Who can survive these days on £28000 per year. I want the government to put NHS staff first. Tax big companies like google Apple Facebook oil companies more so that we can support the Nurses and other low paid staff!
attributes.background: Salary increase for our hardworking and courageous Nurses and other NHS staff who put others first. Minimum salary should start from £40000 - £50000

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for similar actions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

Increase National Insurance by 5 pence to Increase Salaries for all NHS Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310518
